title: U.S. sulfur dioxide emissions 1970 to 2017
yAxis: Volume of emissions in thousand tons
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Volume of emissions in thousand tons, containing a total of 20 data points.
In general Volume of emissions in thousand tons has fallen over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 1990 and 1995.
Maximum Volume of emissions in thousand tons, about 31218.0 was reported at Year 1970
The lowest Volume of emissions in thousand tons, of value 2815.0 was reported at Year 2017
